'''''The Forgotten Kingdom''''' is the first book in the fantasy series [[The Firland Saga]], inspired by the fictional works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>Henrik Larsen, "Landet du ikke kan nå" ("The Country You cannot Reach"), published in ''Obskuriøst'' nr. 5/6, June 2003. Further elaborations by the same author in "[http://www.cultmovies.dk/obskur/firland.htm Firland - om en særdeles obskuriøs bogserie]" (web page, as of July 18, 2010)</ref>

==Editions==

*England: 
**''The Firland Saga''. Kinver: Halmer Publicity Services, 1970
**''The Forgotten Kingdom: The Firland Saga''. Blackie & Son, 1973

*Canada: 
**''The Firland Saga''. Paideia Press, 1981.

*Denmark: 
**''Sagaen om Firland''. Skandinavisk Bogforlag, 1973.
